name: TetraX - A Modified RLC Trainer
abstract: Tetra-X Trainer is a device for learning, teaching, and testing Resistance, Voltage, Inductance, and Capacitance digital electronic circuits...
introduction: The TetraX Trainer is designed to bridge the gap in practical electronics education by providing a versatile and user-friendly platform...
objectives: Enhance Learning and Understanding: To provide a practical and interactive learning tool...
Simplify Circuit Assembly: To create a platform that allows users to easily build, modify, and test a wide range of electronic circuits...
Integrate Modern Technology: To incorporate digital technology into the learning process...
Promote Versatility and Flexibility: To design a trainer that can be used for various educational purposes...
Foster Innovation: To encourage students to experiment with different circuit configurations and components...

methodology.title: Circuit Design and Simulation
methodology.description: The first step involves the design and simulation of the RLC circuits...
steps: Component Selection: Identifying and selecting the appropriate resistors, capacitors, inductors, diodes (DIAC), and triodes (TRIAC)...
Circuit Schematic Design: Creating detailed schematics using MATLAB software...
Simulation: Using simulation tools to model the behavior of the circuits before physical assembly...

methodology.title: PCB Design and Fabrication
methodology.description: Once the circuit design and simulation are complete, the next step is to design and fabricate the PCB...
steps: PCB Layout Design: Translating the circuit schematics into a PCB layout...
PCB Fabrication: Fabricating the PCB according to the design specifications...

discussion: The trainer consists of different resistors of values 33, 22, 68, 100, and 220 ohms...
It includes an inductor and capacitor of 1 H & 1 microfarad...
The switch is used to turn electric current on and off...
Using a multimeter, various readings can be measured, and different circuits can be built on the trainer...
This trainer is compact, portable, and ideal for educational use...
conclusion: The TetraX Trainer is an ideal learning tool for gaining practical knowledge in circuit design and analysis...
